price: Abemeye rero Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bagakora n’ivyiza bitegetswe, bazogumirizwa akabanga ku vyaha vyabo ntibabihanirwe mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa, bazonaronka n’impano zubashwe kandi zamaho mu Bwami bw’ijuru;
arabic: فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَرِزۡقٞ كَرِيمٞ

meta.transliteration: fa-alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum maghfiratun wariz'qun karīmun
